The shadowTiddler tag

= Introduction =

Allows you to define tiddlers that become shadowTiddlers on all subordinate pages.

= Details =

By tagging a tiddler shadowTiddler, it will appear under the special tab in the directory, as do all standard shadow tiddlers. But it will also appear as a shadow tiddler on all pages, that have a URL starting with the source page URL (which could be /).
